meanings.definition: An obsolete taxonomic group of bivalve molluscs.
meanings.english_definition: An obsolete taxonomic group of bivalve molluscs.

etymology.value: From Latin sub- (near, under) + Mytilacea (the taxonomic name for mussels and related bivalves).

usage_notes.explanation: This term is no longer in common use due to changes in taxonomic classification based on modern phylogenetic methods.
